snippet.title: Ninjahtic Mind Tricks - Trailer
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION

Ninjahtic Mind Tricks is an 8-bit hack-and-slash platformer with stealth, adventure, and puzzle elements. Like it's predecessor, Ninjahtic, levels have an open-ended nature and are presented in a linear fashion. Though, several features have been added to original's formula to create a more varied experience.

Features:
- Various platforming challenges with a mixture of hack-and-slash, stealth, adventure, and puzzle elements

- Open ended levels requiring the use of the enviroment and abilities for progression

- Enemies of various types

- 8-bit graphics and soundtrack

- Supports Xbox 360 Controller

It's currently available on the PC and like all of my other games, it's
developed entirely by myself.
